Uses of Interface
com.microsoft.azure.storage.RetryPolicyFactory

  • Packages that use RetryPolicyFactory 
    Package Description
    com.microsoft.azure.storage
    This package contains the storage service base classes.
    com.microsoft.azure.storage.core
    FOR INTERNAL USE ONLY.

    • Uses of RetryPolicyFactory in com.microsoft.azure.storage

      Classes in com.microsoft.azure.storage that implement RetryPolicyFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RetryExponentialRetry
      Represents a retry policy that performs a specified number of retries, using a randomized exponential backoff scheme to determine the interval between retries.
      class  RetryLinearRetry
      Represents a retry policy that performs a specified number of retries, using a specified fixed time interval between retries.
      class  RetryNoRetry
      Represents a retry policy that performs no retries.
      class  RetryPolicy
      Abstract class that represents a retry policy.
      Methods in com.microsoft.azure.storage that return RetryPolicyFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RetryPolicyFactory RequestOptions.getRetryPolicyFactory()
      Gets the retry policy to use for this request.
      Methods in com.microsoft.azure.storage with parameters of type RetryPolicyFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RequestOptions.setRetryPolicyFactory(RetryPolicyFactory retryPolicyFactory)
      Sets the RetryPolicyFactory object to use for this request.
